#BlackMagicCraft #Episode219 #Miniatures

In this episode I create 3 tiny crafted objects to add to terrain, miniatures, dioramas, fairy gardens, or whatever teeny tiny hobby you are into crafting. Crystals, Mushrooms, and Webs!

Check out Danny's Kickstarter: https://bit.ly/LostAdv2
